title: Merciless King
description: I’m Chuck Sansone. Cocky, arrogant and the best boxer in the world. I’m a part-time building maintenance guy for Dexter Truitt and now his newest project.It’s been the same structured routine for years: training, working and fighting. But with Dex behind me, someone who can see my end goal and believes in me, I know this is my time. Finally…I will fight for the heavyweight world boxing title.Nothing will stop this from happening.Not my team.Not my friends. Not the headstrong, desirable, gorgeous blonde bombshell- Caroline.Certainly not the deadly intruder in my life or the unwanted revelation that will change my life forever.Blackmail won’t work either.But who do I trust?Loyalties and people will be broken if I’m to continue with my life ambition of being Heavyweight Champion of the world.I hope the selfish destruction I cause will be worth it.A work based on the book Mister Moneybags in the Cocky book series by Vi Keeland and Penelope Ward. Coming 2020.
author: Ellie Jean
